comments: A001203 is the continued fraction for Pi.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) contfrac(2*Pi)(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(2*Pi); for (n=0, 20000, write("b058291.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 31 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A019692 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 31 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 24 2001
